attributes.action: grant an OBE for leaking MPs expenses to the media
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whoever leaked the details of MPs expense claims should be honoured by HM the Queen for services to the public.

By exposing such large scale fraud they have done an immense service to the public and should be rewarded.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
